title: Motion (Lee – Hernandez) relative to the status and improvements to the Special Events Permit.

appearances.section: Items for which Public Hearings Have Been Held
appearances.recommendation: INSTRUCT the Bureau of Street Services, with the assistance of the Department of Transportation, Los Angeles Police Department (LAPD), and Department of Building and Safety, and any other necessary departments, to report on the current status of the Special Events Permit process and with recommendations to improve the current program, resources needed for continued support of events, amendments to the program if the current process exceeds departments’ functional capacities, and consideration of whether the LAPD Parades and Assemblies Permit should be consolidated with the Special Events Permit process. Fiscal Impact Statement: Neither the City Administrative Officer nor the Chief Legislative Analyst has completed a financial analysis of this report. Community Impact Statement: None submitted Report from Public Works Committee_11-12-25 Motion (Lee - Hernandez) dated 10-15-25
